title: Eikoku Ikka, Nihon wo Taberu (Sushi and Beyond)
synopsis: Based on a book by British travel and dining journalist Michael Booth. Follows Booth, his wife Lissen, and two kids Ansger (6) and Emil (4), on their 100-day trip to Japan as they try a wide variety of Japanese foods. Booth was inspired to make the trip by Shizuo Tsuji's book,
related_anime: ['Eikoku Ikka, Nihon wo Taberu: English Ikka, Shougatsu wo Taberu']
